name: 蒼葉
message: "Haah..."
I breathe a sigh of relief as I enter the building, but Noiz just gives me a scowl.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Where do you get off?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I was about to wipe the floor with them until you showed up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Excuse me?"
Anger rises to replace my frustration. There's a difference between being independent and being a selfish asshole.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Listen here. If you get mixed up in some shit, it'll come back to bite us both in the ass. Aren't you supposed to be smart?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guys like that don't let things go. They stick to your ass like glue. Yeah, sure, they're obnoxious, but you know what?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "We're already way out of our depth here. We don't need more problems. Let's just stick to the mission, got it?"
Noiz grumpily side-eyes me.
Does the fact that he's not arguing mean that I got through to him?
I look at Noiz again, and my eyes go wide.
His hand is bright red.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! You're hurt again! There's blood everywhere!"
I reach for his hand, but he smacks me away.

name: ノイズ
message: "Don't touch me."
Noiz glares at me icily.
What is wrong with him...
He acted the same way after the incident with the coffee. Why does he have such a violent reaction to being touched?
For a guy who seems indifferent to everything, it's strange. Is he some kind of germaphobe?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Come on. We have to at least stop the bleeding."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's fine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You want it to get worse? Let me look at it."

name: ノイズ
message: "I said it's fi―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let me see."

name: ノイズ
message: "Let go."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No."
There's no use trying to convince him, so I grab his arm and pull it toward me.
I know if I don't press the issue, the wound will just go untreated.

name: 蒼葉
message: "If it really bothers you, then hit me."
Noiz seems pretty upset, but he eventually stops struggling and looks away.
The injury is worse than I'd thought. The whole back of his hand is torn up.
One of those yakuza must've gotten him with a knife or something.
Actually, what about his injury from yesterday? I surreptitiously check his fingertips.
He has a red line running down his middle finger, but it doesn't seem that bad.
Phew...
It was weighing on me a lot, since I basically caused that injury, so it's a relief to see it isn't that bad.
...That's when I realize that I need supplies to treat his hand.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Stay put. I'll be right back."
I release his hand, go to the bar, and start going through the drawers one by one.
After pulling out several drawers, I find one that's empty except for a first aid kit.
It's one of those types that come in a little vinyl pack with bandages, disinfectant wipes, and different sizes of band-aids.
Good enough. I grab the kit and return to Noiz.
When I take his arm again, Noiz gives me a look of disgust.
I ignore him and take a closer look at his wound.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Man, that must really hurt."
I wipe away the blood with a tissue. Just looking at it makes me wince.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This might sting a little."
I gently wipe the wound with a disinfectant sheet, knowing that it'll sting no matter how careful I am.
I watch Noiz's face, trying to gauge how much it hurts.
...Huh? He seems totally fine.
Does it not hurt? Or is he faking it out of some weird sense of pride?
If it's the latter, I have to hand it to him. That's some impressive willpower.
In any case, I finish up and cover the wound with the biggest band-aid I have.

name: 蒼葉
message: "There, finished."
Noiz takes back his hand, glaring like an angry child.
I'm just glad I got his wound treated this time.
